channel.title: ToS 2 - Uninformed Spectator Chat - Archived
channel.description:
Chloe =
[quote="Chloe, post:2, topic:81586, full:true"] gunna get a soulread on kat tomorrow
watch me [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:3, topic:81586, full:true"] oh also
[quote="Jane, post:1, topic:81585"] Coven factional kilsl will be “Massacred by the **Coven** ” [/quote]
kilsl [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:5, topic:81586, full:true"] aight without having read a single thing imma guess the coven
Wazza, oB_Light, EVO, Fossil
now i go to sleep sleepy gamer time
oh also, gorta NK ez mode [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:9, topic:81586, full:true"] [quote="CRichard564, post:1309, topic:81585"] Well I think I’ll be looking forward to seeing the spectator chat once this game is over. [/quote]
fuck okay guys
uhhhh make content [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:12, topic:81586, full:true"] Ugh im like halfway through this day and so much has happened already lmfao
A. Why did CRich claim with so little pressure on his slot??? Mayor claiming d1 is absolutely horrendous for town
B. Why is Alice buddying him? Doesn’t she usually call people out for poor plays like this? Its like she wants to be on his good side because he seems easy to manipulate. Seems scummy
C. Wazza probably town. Anger towards CRich outting seems genuine
D. As of this second i have a fat null on my sister. I’ll figure her out later [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:14, topic:81586, full:true"] But i needa goooooo
Hehskdjeksjdhdhejs Guess imma keep reading
Theyre talking about pkr being neut and magnus being jailor and i dont know how people cannot detect sarcasm, or read what pkr said
Aaaaa [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:22, topic:81586"] Catching up rn
Also i have zero doubt that informed chat is more talkative
I havent paid attn to the game until this morning [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:24, topic:81586, full:true"] Alright so we have two Vet claims
Alice & Marshal
Marshal claimed with the intent of lynching Alice for her fakeclaim. In most worlds, Alice would be the lynch today. However, Alice has been buddying the Mayor (not calling him out for his shit play) - who very much dislikes Marshal.
Alice should absolutely be lynched today but shes in a great position not to be because of the Marshal x CRich interaction
The fact that she buddied up to the Mayor kinda (?) removes her from the Phantom/Shade possibility cuz she would wanna be lynched (but i could be reading into her interactions with CRich too much)
Claiming vet will deter people from visiting her at night. So I will remove Exe from the possibilities. Cuz who tf cares if you’re visited as Exe.
I don’t see any reasonable NK making this play so imma remove them as well.
Meaning Alice is any non-shade NB, a TI, or Coven? I guess theres a tiny world where she is Cit but why would you do this shit
Aaaaaa Alice’s plays dont make much sense to me sometimes
If she IS Coven, they almost definitely have a Coven Leader from my perspective (or maybe there are other similar coven members). Baiting out *any* TK claims can almost guarantee that Coven get a kill using them. So yeah.
Mobile chloe thoughts Part 1 [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:25, topic:81586, full:true"] But why the fuck would you take that risk as Coven?
Hhhhnnnggg
I suppose it makes sense in the fact that Alice is usually a Policy Lynch since shes too good at the damn game.
Removing herself now, while not spewing anything to out her coven-members, yet also getting multiple Townies to out… isnt *that* bad?
This is a lot of shit on d1 lmfao [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:26, topic:81586, full:true"] Theres also the possibility that Alice is good and Marshal is NB/NE
Coven or NK would be suicidal to CC the d1 vet [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:29, topic:81586, full:true"] Oh Wazza really just claimed Vig
For the sake of my own sanity im going to just ignore that and brush it off as fake. That never happened. [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:30, topic:81586, full:true"] Watch her come out with that snazzy doc claim
Which is why she was buddying mayor
Oh yeah marshal rt could exist as well but Hnnng [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:31, topic:81586, full:true"] Seems like a doc soft afterall, eh?
If she flips doc who did a vetclaim FPS i might ask to replace-in for the NK so i can murder someone
Like, i understand the logic behind it. Gets evils off your ass at night, stops TIs from wasting a check on you
But the amount of claims this brought out, if it *is* FPS, is kinda -EV [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:32, topic:81586, full:true"] Oh I was wrong on the Doc part. But still wanna kill someone [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:33, topic:81586, full:true"] Her first post, which she asked people to read regarding her soft, asked Mayor not to reveal until XYLO. I read that as a doc soft. I want to kill someone a little less if she is TI. If she were actually Doc who did this shit i would be upsetti spaghetti [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:39, topic:81586, full:true"] If Alice is fake, i *really* hope the true TI doesnt start softing here, or its suicide. Same thing goes for if Alice is real and RT is TI [/quote] In response to another spec's reads: [quote="Chloe, post:44, topic:81586, full:true"] You think Coven Marshal would cc a vet d1, not knowing if its FPS or not? [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:46, topic:81586, full:true"] With a Mayor up his ass for “forcing him to claim” I don’t see Coven (or NK) Marshal being this suicidal this early. He should lay low and let the heat dissipate [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:47, topic:81586, full:true"] Shade or Phantom are possibilities [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:54, topic:81586, full:true"] I don’t see a world where Marshal does this as NK/Coven. But I might not know him well enough.
Hes Vet/NB/Phantom to me - heavily leaning Vet [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:55, topic:81586, full:true"] I still have my eye on Alice. While her true claim makes sense, I still don’t see a super strong reasoning for her to do the claim swap [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:58, topic:81586, full:true"] I want more from EVO
So far I don’t see him being W/W with Alice, simply based on his progression on that slot
He had it as his lowest town/null read for being a lowposter, he brought up the idea of Coven Leader existing alongside Coven!Alice, and he parked a vote on her pretty early on into the thunderdome
Gimme more shit, EVO Either theyre both town, or EVO is Coven pushing for the easy mislynch [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:59, topic:81586, full:true"] If Alice is Town, she shouldn’t live to see tomorrow. That is, unless Italy is true Transporter and he does some bonkers wifom shit
If Alice is alive tomorrow I will definitely question things. True TI would likely have a check on her as well
But now with her TI claim she has some nutty Medusa bait ngl [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:60, topic:81586, full:true"] I needa stop focusing on this slot sigh
I’m tunnelvisioned and im not even in the damn game [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:140, topic:81586, full:true"] [quote="Chloe, post:58, topic:81586"] I want more from EVO > > > > So far I don’t see him being W/W with Alice, simply based on his progression on that slot > > > > He had it as his lowest town/null read for being a lowposter, he brought up the idea of Coven Leader existing alongside Coven!Alice, and he parked a vote on her pretty early on into the thunderdome > > > > Gimme more shit, EVO > Either theyre both town, or EVO is Coven pushing for the easy mislynch [/quote]
Imma re-read EVO but after the alice flip my mind has him 99.9% as coven
Or i GUESS nk but like Pretty ballsy nk
I needa check vcs again to see if he switched around [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:141, topic:81586, full:true"] So three people i townread (one of which is dead) were on the cheese wagon at the end. Which… doesnt look *great* for him - but he never pushed the counterwagon?
In fact, i think i remember him saying something about how he would take the lynch if it meant alice lived
He went down a townie point from the town votes on his slot, and went up two townie points for not voting alice, and saying he would rather be the lynch
But i could absolutely be remembering something wrong So much happened d1 I really needa re-read errythang
Plus, the fact that alice died to *majority* and not plurality makes me think scum were on her wagon - thus its possible that the cheese wagon was all/mostly town…? [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:142, topic:81586, full:true"] I’m still not great at analyzing votes but this is my attempt to get better [/quote]
[quote="Jane, post:144, topic:81586, full:true"] Read on the cat?
###### If you haven’t already said it. [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:145, topic:81586, full:true"] Fuck
Cit I guess
I honestly havent been paying attn to kat Ugh Guess i’ll skim iso [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:147, topic:81586, full:true"] Wait did EVO claim???
Oh shit I think i skipped past like 400 posts
Im ISOing katze and i dont remember half of this happening And theyre talking about a twilight and evo claim Jejdkdjeksjd
Also kat hella town btw (could be pr tbh)
Time to see what i skipped [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:151, topic:81586, full:true"] I think EVO is Medusa here.
Either that or they have Soulbender
Wazza/vig should should someone in PoE who *is not* EVO.
They lose practically nothing for shooting - as, if there is a CL, they will be forced to do so anyways
They might as well go for a scumread. If they have Soulbender and vig shoots EVO, like… 2 townies will be killed from it as well (vig and whoever else) so thats fun
I think EVOs TI claim makes sense from the perspective of a Medusa, as its practically suicidal, but will almost guarantee a visit on him tonight [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:152, topic:81586, full:true"] The sad thing is that I do see the vig shooting EVO tonight
It makes sense theoretically but There are many classes that can interfere with it, and going for an obvious target just makes that easier for Coven to fuck it up
I will not be surprised if EVO dies tonight along with a soulbound target Or a vig claim dies tonight while visiting a Medusa [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:153, topic:81586, full:true"] The fact that I scumread EVO without even knowing that he CC’d TI has him as almost lockscum in my books. His claim was the nail in the coffin [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:157, topic:81586, full:true"] Zone town [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:158, topic:81586, full:true"] Im on post 5280 (not caught up)
Wazza is true Vig or Shade/NB (leaning shade)
NK wazz doesnt do this Shrug [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:159, topic:81586, full:true"] Town Power - CRich (Mayor) Town Investigative - Tw1 (Sher) Town Killing - PKR (Vig) Random Town - Derps (Vig) Random Town - Wazza (Vig) Random Town - EVO (Lookout)
Reads by chloe: **Town (kinda ordered, but eh not completely)** CRich Geyde PKR Zone Tw1
Cheese Derps Magnus Wazza (likely shade) Pogman
EVO
**Scum**
I missed a lot of people but idc These are the names i can remember [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:164, topic:81586"] I’m happy with an EVO lynch
What I’m not happy with is how mechanics-happy this town is [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:164, topic:81586"] Don’t lynch EVO because you have a “nightplan” for doing it - but lynch EVO because hes fuckin scum, and it makes more sense than lynching someone who is begging for it
Also Wazza is baiting the lynch *hard* - hes almost definitely Neutral Benign in my mind. Unless there is some coven role that benefits from being lynched. I just dont see why people are so obsessed with his NK claim and assuming its real [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:167, topic:81586"] [Wazza] If he isn’t a Vig FPSing, hes very much NB in my eyes
In the instance that hes shade: He likely wants EVO to hammer him, as EVO will be killed tomorrow and coven will just spiral into a loss
PKR could also just shoot him tonight and become his killer
Basically, if wazza is shade, hes pretty set up for a win rn - whether he dies today or tonight [/quote] [quote="Jane, post:173, topic:81586"] NK Predictions? [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:175, topic:81586"] I guess off the top of my head uhh
TBE, possessed, magnus - probably my top 3 candidates [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:176, topic:81586, full:true"] Oh cheese is also a candidate. I townread him, but apparently not many other people do [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:178, topic:81586, full:true"] Unironically think derps could be real vig here lmfao
That is probably so wrong I just WANT Him to be vig [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:180, topic:81586, full:true"] Wazz could be Guardian Angel as well, but fuck if i know who his target is
He hasnt shown any signs of pocketing anyone Shrug He likely isnt [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:183, topic:81586, full:true"] Bigasssss tinfoil: Coven has a fanatic that empowered whoever was doing the nightkill - in order to kill Italy who was likely to be protected
(Idk if the empower makes you redir/occ immune for the night but if so, the killer woulda gone thru a swap if italy tried to save himself) [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:185, topic:81586, full:true"] Oh i forgot that Alice flipped TI LMFAO Lets see
Town Power - CRich (Mayor) Town Investigative - Alice (Tracker?iirc) Town Killing - PKR (Vig) Random Town - Derps (Vig) Random Town - Wazza (Vig) Random Town - Tw1 (Sheriff)/EVO (Lookout)
Reads by chloe: **Town (kinda ordered, but eh not completely)** CRich Geyde PKR Zone Tw1 TBE
Cheese Derps oB Magnus Wazza (likely NB) Pogman
EVO
**Scum**
I missed a lot of people but idc - theyre probably slankers lul
If one/either of Wazza or Derps is fake, that opens up 1or2 PR slots. Likely to be occuped by… Geyde, TBE, MAYBE seth (but he probably woulda claimed by now :upside_down_face:) [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:186, topic:81586"] EVO flipping coven invest
Thats my theory [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:192, topic:81586, full:true"] Oh shit
If they Soulgazed katze’s slot, and the slot is the missing PR
RIP GEYDE OOF [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:196, topic:81586, full:true"] So I went back and read Wazza’s ISO and I literally do not see him being *anything* but Shade.
Hes kinda fucked though since he didnt die to lynch? If hes vigged, he has to somehow help coven/nk win. Coven is down a member, and lolnk
I’ll have to go remind myself what abilities Shade has but… idk if they would help coven/nk?
Also this means Derps was lying (duh) - and is probably real vig tbh.
So, that gives us another PR slot, since Wazza aint town Gunna keep that in mind. I’m sure people will forget it [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:197, topic:81586, full:true"] My thought process:
Shade needs to die in order to achieve wincondition. They can either die during the day or at night. They have to make sure their killer loses.
Wazza set up so many fake claims and mech bullshit throughout the game, all leading up to him “giving up” as Neutral Killer.
Why the hell would he give up at that point in the game? Why would he try to die JUST so he could see EVO die
He wasnt Poisoned - you arent told if you are poisoned. So hes perfectly capable of killing if he IS NK. Also, EVO was Soulbender. If you are Soulbender, and you know you are getting vigged (because Alice flipped TI and you CC’d her) - why would you not use Link Souls on yourself and the vig. Maybe because… that person cant actually attack you?
He was pushing to get himself lynched today, but he can still die tonight to progress his wincon. However, getting EVO to hammer him was his best option - as its easier to see coven lose. If he’s vigged tonight, he has to somehow see that town loses [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:200, topic:81586, full:true"] If PKR/Derps end up not shooting Wazza because they realize that hes Shade
I will be hella hella happy And love them forever
(But this probably wont happen smile) [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:206, topic:81586, full:true"] [quote="Possessed, post:6622, topic:81585"] Agree with this. It also seems likely Derps is the actual NK. Who do we want gone first? [/quote]
Oh this gives me baaaaaad vibes bro
Possessed you nk?
Imma watch out for Possessed trying to pocket Seth. Think it might happen [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:211, topic:81586, full:true"] Uni is appealing to emotion but like Nerd emotion Cuz hes missing school
Appeal to nerdmotion AtN
~~i guess i should figure out if this is AI for him~~ [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:212, topic:81586, full:true"] Aight here comes a gamer moment
NK: Possessed
Coven: Magnus Gorta Cheese/Derps/Uni (leaning Uni ngl)
Third coven could be a deepwolf Fairly confident in the first two though
Also if they have a Hex Master, shit will be fucked
I cant quote and format things quickly on mobile but imma explain my thoughts later
Oh shit wait Fossil was in Derps’ slot. Guess i can go back and try to read Fossil [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:214, topic:81586"] You have permission to quote anything ive said - to anywhere. I dont care
I’ll probably quote my shit if i end up right lmfao
I’m already proud of myself for noticing that Wazza was NB [/quote] [quote="Jane, post:217, topic:81586, full:true"] What’s your current PoE?
[quote="Chloe, post:212, topic:81586"] Possessed [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:212, topic:81586"] Magnus > Gorta > Cheese/Derps/Uni (leaning Uni ngl) [/quote]
This? [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:218, topic:81586, full:true"] Yep
Tempted to throw TBE in there as a possible deepwolf - but hes a slight townlean so I’ll not put him in the PoE unless he posts something that gives me reason to [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:219, topic:81586, full:true"] Town Power - CRich (Mayor) Town Investigative - Alice (Tracker?iirc) Town Killing - PKR (Vig) Random Town - Tw1 (Sher) Random Town - Random Town -
Possible RTs in order of most to least likely from my pov: Geyde TBE oB Derps Cheese Zone
Gotta love that my RT list overlaps with my PoE lmfao
I really need to re-read this game [/quote] [quote="Jane, post:220, topic:81586, full:true"] ~~What if I told you those were exactly the two last PRs?~~
I mean, I wouldn’t.
But how would you react? [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:221, topic:81586, full:true"] Its a list of 6 people
I wouldnt be incredibly surprised
But i do think geyde is likely PR [/quote] [quote="Jane, post:222, topic:81586, full:true"] [quote="Chloe, post:219, topic:81586"] Geyde > TBE [/quote]
I was referring to “those two”. [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:223, topic:81586, full:true"] I wouldnt be surprised if Geyde were PR
I heavily townread kat, and they were being a cautious townie. I dont wanna “preflip” or whatever its called, but im pretty sure thats a PR
TBE i see as very likely as well. I need to recheck his ISO for softs, but i just Have a good feeling? Idk
What im trying to say is that i wouldnt be surprised - but its still a possibility that i fucked up in reading TBE [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:228, topic:81586, full:true"] Alright so Geyde is TI
TBE noticed the soft and is saying nothing if TBE is town, I really wanna commend him for how he plays, hes really freakin good for a newbie ngl [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:229, topic:81586, full:true"] Geyde why, honey, nooo
I don’t think he needed to out there, *at all*
Magnus was a consensus scumread
But HEY i got a PR right [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:230, topic:81586, full:true"] oB softing marshal
or i guess trapper [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:232, topic:81586, full:true"] I swear to god if oB hardclaims something rn
i will flip a table [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:233, topic:81586, full:true"] Town Power - CRich (Mayor) Town Investigative - Alice (Tracker?iirc) Town Killing - PKR (Vig) Random Town - Tw1 (Sher) Random Town - Geyde (Lookout) Random Town - oB (Marshal/Trapper soft?) OR cit rolled
Townies: Alice, Italy, Twil1ght, CRich, PKR, Geyde, oB, Zone, ModeShifter, TBE, clonedcheese
PoE: gorta Possessed Derps Uni Magnus
Edited to remove cheese from PoE. I just think hes townie ngl [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:235, topic:81586, full:true"] I don’t want them to lynch cheese today. I want Possessed out. Magnus can die (or not die) to vigi tonight
If Geyde and PKR die tonight, town is left with (a few select players) to fucking lead things
jesus christ i hope this doesnt happen they will tunnel everyone TBE better whip some sense into people [/quote] [This next quote was pretty and I don't want to remove the formatting]
![image|690x453](upload://f9KrZ7zK7TrmPukI7ggm6Xawj8e.png)
[quote="Chloe, post:242, topic:81586, full:true"] [quote="TheBlueElixir, post:7569, topic:81585"] both visit Magnus tonight. I want PKR mech confirmed and Geyde to do it [/quote]
this would make a very happy medusa [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:243, topic:81586, full:true"] [quote="TheBlueElixir, post:7588, topic:81585"] actually funny you say this, p sure I can mech confirm another vig but I wont out them today, incase one of them were occ’d. More will be explained in my logs/tomorrow, I have to keep this short, lest coven put together that ? has softed it. [/quote]
Got it, so our missing RT is oB as vig, hence the “i will make sure PKR hits his target”
easy enough [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:244, topic:81586, full:true"] How the hell can TBE mech confirm someone though. Hmmm
Honestly hes a fucking great player ngl i love this little newbie [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:246, topic:81586, full:true"] [quote="TheBlueElixir, post:7631, topic:81585"] If I survive, tomorrow I very well may ask you to shoot me [/quote]
[quote="TheBlueElixir, post:7669, topic:81585"] if PKR shoot magnus and their both town, we lose [/quote]
He seems to know that vig has guilt, yet hes asking to be shot? There is no room for another neut. Ugh, confused chloe
Maybe TBE is the fuckin vig Its between him and oB [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:247, topic:81586"] New list:
Town Power - CRich (Mayor) - confirmed Town Investigative - Alice (Tracker) - confirmed (dead) Town Killing - PKR (Vig) Random Town - Tw1 (Sher) - confirmed (dead) Random Town - Geyde (Lookout) Random Town - oB/TBE (Vigilante/Firebrand)
Townies: Alice, Italy, Twil1ght, CRich, PKR, Geyde, oB, Zone, ModeShifter, TBE
**PoE (most to least likely scum):** Magnus Possessed
gorta uni derps
cheese
Possible oB Vig softs?
[quote="Aelin, post:1189, topic:81585"] not if I night-vig you first… during the day!! [/quote]
[quote="Aelin, post:4786, topic:81585"] Also, I should point out that I had my reasons for pushing Italy, but then flipping Cit makes 100% more sense. [/quote]
^ He takes up a RT slot
[quote="Aelin, post:4819, topic:81585"] I’ve been softing my role for like the past twenty minutes. [/quote]
[quote="Aelin, post:5551, topic:81585"] If we shoot Wazza tonight, we are freely available to lynch again tomorrow. If we lynch Wazza, vigi can’t shoot tonight, and we need to spend tomorrow lynching EVO. [/quote]
^ *we* (this is a stretch i know lmfao)
[quote="Aelin, post:7510, topic:81585"] And, if Geyde is lying, let me just say… I’ll make sure PKR gets their shot off. [/quote]
^ If hes firebrand, he definitely has Geyde doused. Idk how to feel about this :eyes:
[quote="Aelin, post:7686, topic:81585"] Hmm… I’ll do the cloned vote and the Magnus shot. [/quote]
^ (also a stretch shh)
**So, how does TBE have *mech* info on oB?** If *one* of the Vigilantes/Firebrands is fake, this leaves an RT slot for TBE? (I don’t see this as likely - I’m fairly confident that PKR is vig, and oB is town) If this is the case, TBE could be:
* *Investigator* who checked oB * *Lookout* who was on Wazza * *Tracker* who followed oB * *Escort* who occupied PKR - mighta softed this? dunno * HE could be a fuckin Vig/Firebrand * *If possible* - Could be Shade master? Shade could have relayed info from dead * Last but not least, he could just be megabrain Cit (most likely)
Also possible that TBE believes Coven occupied PKR - meaning we *have* to have another Vig. [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:250, topic:81586, full:true"] gorta is slowly making his way out of my poe [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:252, topic:81586, full:true"] Damn Possessed boutta win? [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:253, topic:81586, full:true"] Also fuck my reads have been good
Ugh I wanna die [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:256, topic:81586, full:true"] Cheese might be back in PoE now
Gotta check gorta again as well
But Stalker is going to win this shit [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:258, topic:81586, full:true"] Ah so they did Snowstorm on Geyde n1 Hence the EVO Lookout claim
Why did they not have this class do last night’s factional kill? Magnus must have a shitty class? [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:259, topic:81586, full:true"] Jane, if two Vigilantes shoot the same person, will it show that the player died to 1 Vig, or 2?
I still think PKR is vig [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:261, topic:81586, full:true"] Fuck
They can occ pkr tonight [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:262, topic:81586, full:true"] Why the hell did Twi have to die when checking who i think is NK
reeee [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:264, topic:81586, full:true"] If we have a Hex Master with 2 non-dead players hexxed, a stalker with a non-dead player stalked, and a factional kill
Thats 4 fucking kills
And they will stop the vig shot
If they dont have Hex Master, and Magnus is Medusa like I think, with the same scenario above, and PKR shooting Magnus
Thats 3 kills
AAAAA [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:266, topic:81586, full:true"] two different scenarios
One has a hex master and an occupying coven
The other has medusa [/quote]
[quote="Chloe, post:267, topic:81586, full:true"] Wait fuck
Its medusa
Magnus cant be anything but medusa [/quote]

Alright so we have two Vet claims

Alice & Marshal

Marshal claimed with the intent of lynching Alice for her fakeclaim. In most worlds, Alice would be the lynch today. However, Alice has been buddying the Mayor (not calling him out for his shit play) - who very much dislikes Marshal.

Alice should absolutely be lynched today but shes in a great position not to be because of the Marshal x CRich interaction

The fact that she buddied up to the Mayor kinda (?) removes her from the Phantom/Shade possibility cuz she would wanna be lynched (but i could be reading into her interactions with CRich too much)

Claiming vet will deter people from visiting her at night. So I will remove Exe from the possibilities. Cuz who tf cares if you’re visited as Exe.

I don’t see any reasonable NK making this play so imma remove them as well.

Meaning Alice is any non-shade NB, a TI, or Coven? I guess theres a tiny world where she is Cit but why would you do this shit

Aaaaaa
Alice’s plays dont make much sense to me sometimes

If she IS Coven, they almost definitely have a Coven Leader from my perspective (or maybe there are other similar coven members). Baiting out any TK claims can almost guarantee that Coven get a kill using them. So yeah.

My thought process:

Shade needs to die in order to achieve wincondition. They can either die during the day or at night. They have to make sure their killer loses.

Wazza set up so many fake claims and mech bullshit throughout the game, all leading up to him “giving up” as Neutral Killer.

Why the hell would he give up at that point in the game? Why would he try to die JUST so he could see EVO die

He wasnt Poisoned - you arent told if you are poisoned. So hes perfectly capable of killing if he IS NK. Also, EVO was Soulbender. If you are Soulbender, and you know you are getting vigged (because Alice flipped TI and you CC’d her) - why would you not use Link Souls on yourself and the vig. Maybe because… that person cant actually attack you?

He was pushing to get himself lynched today, but he can still die tonight to progress his wincon. However, getting EVO to hammer him was his best option - as its easier to see coven lose. If he’s vigged tonight, he has to somehow see that town loses
